subject: Hello Friend,
body:
Hello Friend,
What's going on! You have a tax refund generated from your previous tax commission and empowerment schedule to meet your budget and eliminate all your pending bills and debts, this opportunity is given to 3 people every 10 years, and you are lucky to be one of the selected.
Validate your details to bypass you from any emails received from imposters claiming to be in possession of your funds transfer which has been the obstacle behind your past. A memo sent was to inform you for the authorization. Order to legalize the 2023 instant payment commission to buy you a house or land during retirement, So 
to avoid transfer errors and change of ownership, validate postal address if you are no longer with the previous location schedule for the ATM CARD delivery which I am sending to you now.
1 Verify your Postal address and nearest airport:...
2 Name of Receiver.....
3 cell phones & occupations...
4 WhatsApp numbers, if any...,
Contact me for the package quote development to your reverence and avoid late payment. Note" 
this process will cost you $200 and it is a must pay, nondeductible and it has to be paid through Apple card,  or BITCOIN WALLET
 ADDRESS, bc1qv5gy2a7drrsa0dytat39hywaxu2xkyheylv7nk
Thank you and regards    
uascustomsauthority@gmail.com
Robert William and Hudson Williams,

subject: Re: Hello Friend,
body:
Hello Robert and Hudson,

Wow, this sounds like a fantastic opportunity! I'm so lucky to be selected. I've always dreamed of owning my own house or land. 

Could you please tell me more about how this process works? How does the tax refund get generated and how is it used to eliminate bills and debts?

Also, could you explain why the payment for this process has to be made through an Apple card or Bitcoin Wallet Address? I'm not very familiar with these methods.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Donald
